Package BrickDestroy.GameController

Class GameplayController

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.GameController.GameplayController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controllable
public class GameplayController extends Object implements Controllable
GameplayController is used to control the interactions between the objects in model. It has the methods to decide how the objects in model behave based on other objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameplayController

      public GameplayController(javafx.scene.layout.Pane drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      Intialises the controller and the objects in the model for the game.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - The pane that contains the objects for the game.
      brickCount - The amount of bricks allowed for every level.
      lineCount - The amount of lines which the bricks would fill.
      brickDimensionRatio - The ratio between the width and the height of the bricks.
